list.name: Changes
list.comment: Section 20.321(JavaFX; Reading Binary Data and End of File Exceptions): added read of locations.dat, introduced to DataInputStream + Buffered ver, and FileInputStream

task.summary: Section 20.312(JavaFX; Introduction to I/O) - setting up for next area in lesson.
Section 20.313(JavaFX; Writing content - FileWriter class and Finally block): Introduction to the FileWriter class, .write(), .close() and IOException handling
Section 20.314(JavaFX; Try with Resources): introduced to declaring "throw Exception.." and the try-with-resources statement

Section 20.316(JavaFX; BufferedReader): added the read of exits off "directions.txt" with buffered reader, and how to use string.split(regEx); instead of scanner.next()/.nextLine(), added "directions.txt" to versioned files
Section 20.317(JavaFX; Load Big Locations and Edits Files): short lesson - larger files, preparing for next challenge. added _big.txt versions

Section 20.318(JavaFX; Challenge): Mini Challenge part1 - my implementation, works!
(Challenge: Turn the static block into 'try-with-resources')

Section 20.318(JavaFX; Challenge): Mini Challenge part2 - edited out use of scanner for the challenge, more streamline
(Challenge: Turn the static block into 'try-with-resources')

Section 20.319(JavaFX; Buffered Writer and Challenge): Part 1 - my iteration. it works very well! changes instances of 'hashmap' to 'linkedhashmap' in order to easily compare data from data_big manually
Section 20.319(JavaFX; Buffered Writer and Challenge): Part 2 - his iteration; during this I fixed locations_big descriptions using .split(regex, limit).
Section 20.321(JavaFX; Reading Binary Data and End of File Exceptions): added read of locations.dat, introduced to DataInputStream + Buffered ver, and FileInputStream
